title: a series of fortunate events
name: a series of fortunate events
description:
A Map by Ayogist

50 days, 50 celebrations, with 50+ friends!

properties.name: day 10: museum visit with christina and amanda
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist 222 N 20th St, Philadelphia, PA 19103a informative tour of the darwin exhibit and the giant heart with my daughters christina and amanda.

properties.name: day 11: lost on the I-76 with marc (via cellphone)
properties.description: Posted by Ayogistfinding my way to the airport and the I-76 east (NOT west) while chatting with my high school boyfriend nookie (in stamford, CT) and dealing with rain, rush hour traffic, and a rental car with poor visibility.

properties.name: day 12: thai dinner with suzy (via proxy)
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist11940 W Pico Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90064pad thai and curry at chan dara with my sister tina (sitting in for my sister suzy, who\'s back in the philippines).

properties.name: day 13: awards luncheon with carol and christine
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist9876 Wilshire Blvd, Beverly Hills, CA 90210national philanthropy day awards ceremony in the beverly hills ballroom with barlow foundation VP carol and her assistant, christine.

properties.name: day 14: noho theatre with debbie, ellen, and katie
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist 5269 Lankershim Blvd, North Hollywood, CA 91601"the marvelous wonderettes" and music from the 50\'s and 60\'s with fellow leggers debbie, ellen, and katie.

properties.name: day 15: yoga to lift your spirits with billy and michael
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist  2215 Main St, Santa Monica, CA 90405a gentle yoga class with soothing sounds from tibetan bowls with billy asad and michael perricone.

properties.name: day 16: breakfast with the legger breakfast bunch
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist395 Santa Monica Blvd, Santa Monica, CA 90401a post-run (16 miles!) get-together at the mall with genaro, sheri, jackie, steve, martin and jacob, dan, rose, ken, and tonya.

properties.name: day 17: mountain hiking with chris d
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist hiking the scenic mount lowe railway trail with my long-time friend chris up to inspiration point, with its awe-inspiring view of the city.

properties.name: day 18: gym yoga with phil
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist  22633 Ventura Blvd, Woodland Hills, CA 91363a flow yoga class at a fitness center with fellow legger phil, taught by his friend kristin.

properties.name: day 19: cuban dinner with dana
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist10319 Venice Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90034a shared bowl of paella, garlic bread, and a flan presented with a "happy birthday panchita!" at versailles with my friend dana, a fellow legger and 50-state marathoner.

properties.name: day 1: persian dinner with cindy f and sonny
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist1712 Westwood Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90024kabobs and baklava at shamshiri with my cousin cindy and her husband, sonny.

properties.name: day 20: pacific rim dinner with marvy
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist110 N 1st St, Burbank, CA 91502calamari, catfish, and a pair of birthday sundaes at the elephant bar with my grade school/high school classmate, marvy.

properties.name: day 21: thanksgiving with gigi, honey, and boo
properties.description: Posted by Ayogista turkey feast and its aftermath spent with my sister gigi, her husband arnel, and their cat (aka my niece) boo.

properties.name: day 22: dvorak, janacek, and harbison with brian b
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist111 S Grand Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90012second row orchestra (aka "shoe view") seats at the disney concert hall with my dear friend brian, with post-performance drinks by the fireplace at the omni lounge.

properties.name: day 23: a debut with lawrence and trish
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist15600 Odyssey Dr, Granada Hills, CA 91344a traditional filipino coming-of-age celebration held at the odyssey with my cousin lawrence and his wife trish for their daughter alex, the debutante.

properties.name: day 24: kid's birthday party with tita baby, lee, and linda
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist  the filipino tradition of too much food and never enough family gossip with my tita baby, my cousins laura and lee, and the birthday girl, 3 year old natalie.

properties.name: day 25: burgers with marilou and ron
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist6500 Canoga Ave, Woodland Hills, CA 91303a quick workday lunch at topz burgers with my cousin marilou and her fiancee ron.

properties.name: day 26: a home-cooked filipino meal with tita alice, jay, christie, and rachel
properties.description: Posted by Ayogistbeef sinigang at tita alice\'s home with her son JV, his wife christie, and their daughter rachel

properties.name: day 27: playing dress-up with sophie
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist2115 Sawtelle Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90025mugging for the camera while in santa garb with my friend and happy six owner, sophie.

properties.name: day 28: music flow yoga with david
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist   1422 2nd St, Santa Monica, CA 90401an invigorating yoga class with witty david romanelli of yoga and chocolate fame.

properties.name: day 29: a friday lunch break with paula
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist5919 Canoga Ave, Woodland Hills, CA 91367catching up on the past year over salads at t.g.i. fridays with my former alta health manager paula.

properties.name: day 2: smy staff party with bruce
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist 1640 ocean park blvd, santa monica, CApizza, pastries, and punch with my "boss" bruce bair and the rest of the gang at santa monica yoga.

properties.name: day 30: UCLA-USC football telecast with chris l
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist 1410 3rd St, Santa Monica, CA 90401beers and bar food at yankee doodles while watching the bruins beat the trojans 13-9 with my former medecision co-worker chris.

properties.name: day 31: inaugural city of angels half marathon with martin
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist110 N Hill St, Los Angeles, CA 90012starting the 13.1 mile trek in 39-degree temps at traveltown in griffith park and finishing by the courthouse in downtown in 2:26 with fellow legger martin (and hordes of other "veteran" leggers).

properties.name: day 32: a cafe lunch with salpi (via proxy)
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist 6100 Topanga Canyon Blvd, Woodland Hills, CA 91367chatting over salads and sandwiches at the corner bakery with daniel (sitting in for his wife salpi, my former XCS and alta health co-worker, who was too bogged down with work to get away).

properties.name: day 33: fruity frozen yogurt with jeannie
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist11301 Olympic Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90064stopping by pinkberry for some mochi-topped froyo while walking baby and kona, my fellow legger jeannie\'s "granddogs".

properties.name: day 34: mexican dinner with bob, kathie, greg, and brian b
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist1445 4th Street, santa monica careminiscing about the "good old days" over chips and guacamole at the border grill with veteran leggers bob, kathie, greg, and brian.

properties.name: day 35: kings hockey game with steve p
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist1111 S Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CAwatching the kings face off against the predators at the staples center with close friend and physical therapist steve.

properties.name: day 36: office visit with terri and adam
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist1950 Century Park E, Los Angeles, CA 90067nibbling on see\'s chocolates at paulseth and associates with my PT buddies terri and adam.

properties.name: day 37: getting running shoe advice from joe
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist 4224 Lincoln Blvd, Marina del Rey, CA 90292finding a replacement for my ASICS 2110\'s with the help of my kababayan and top to top manager joe matias.

properties.name: day 38: candlelight yoga with christine
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist  124 s la brea ave, los angeles, CAtrying to stay warm in the garden while flowing along with joyful yogi and liberation owner, christine burke.

properties.name: day 39: brazilian dinner with stan
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist10831 Venice Blvd, Los Angeles, CAplantains, chicken, and too much dessert at cafe brasil with my legger buddy stan.

properties.name: day 3: santa clarita half marathon with rose, ruth, and michele
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist24201 West Valencia Blvd, Valencia CA 91355a fun run with fellow leggers -- good conversation, an easy pace, and a 2:22 finish.

properties.name: day 40: argentinian lunch with cindy l
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist6435 Canoga Ave, Woodland Hills, CA 91367sharing the joys (?) of turning 50 over grilled steak and chicken with my long-lost fellow legger veteran cindy.

properties.name: day 41: japanese izakaya dinner with maria
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist424 Wilshire Blvd, Santa Monica, CA 90401grazing on japanese bar food at musha with another of my long-lost legger friends, maria.

properties.name: day 42: golf lesson with steve v
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist 10460 W Pico Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90064reviewing the fine art of arm swings and hip thrusts at the rancho park driving range with golf pro steve vilts.

properties.name: day 43: happy hour with andy, ching, holly, kevin, kimmie, oscar, and stella
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist23527 Calabasas Rd, Calabasas, CA 91302sharing laughter and holiday cheer at the sagebrush cantina with my fellow wellpoint december birthday celebrants kevin (7th), ching (8th), oscar (10th), kimmie (17th), holly (?), andy (23rd), and stella (25th).

properties.name: day 44: bach and la chapelle du quebec with ricky, john, and gina
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist111 S Grand Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90012sounds of the season at the disney concert hall with my cousins ricky and gina and ricky\'s partner john.

properties.name: day 45: hopping on the amtrak pacific surfliner to meet mark
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist801 4th Ave, San Diego, CA 92101enjoying a scenic train ride to san diego, followed by an equally enjoyable meal at the hard rock cafe with my fellow 50-state marathon roomie mark.

properties.name: day 46: hanging out at home with brian and maureen
properties.description: Posted by Ayogisthaving too much fun on pizza and wine at the home of new hip recipient maureen and her husband brian.

properties.name: day 47: japanese-style curry dinner with narcie
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist2130 Sawtelle Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90025comparing office stories at the curry house (then stopping by beard papa\'s for some apres-meal cream puffs) with my former SJHC officemate narcie.

properties.name: day 48: indian dinner with rich
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist428 S San Vicente Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90048chatting over curry and rice while on call with my old legger friend rich (me for an LAX arrival, he for an emergency angio case).

properties.name: day 49: company holiday lunch with the tech team
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist21555 Oxnard St, Woodland Hills, CA 91367comparing holiday traditions over cafeteria turkey and fixins with the wellpoint national migration project technical staff: biju, gireesh, venkat, eunice, and shuang.

properties.name: day 4: hip hop yoga with matt
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist  1612 montana avenue, santa monica, CAa sweaty yoga session taught by my friend and former legger, matthew reyes.

properties.name: day 50!: viewing the pleiades star cluster through a 12-inch zeiss telescope with anita
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist2800 E Observatory Rd, Los Angeles, CA 90027spending my birthday (and the end of the celebration marathon) star- and city-gazing on the rooftop of the newly-remodeled griffith observatory on an unusually cold and windy evening with my long-time legger friend anita.

properties.name: day 5: deep tissue massage by jon
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist 11740 San Vicente Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90049an hour-long knot-releasing session courtesy of my buddy jon, a recent boston qualifier.

properties.name: day 6: drinks with louie and sue
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist2138 Hillhurst Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90027martinis at the tangier bar with my former CSMC co-worker louie and his girlfriend, sue.

properties.name: day 7: tarot card reading with cindy k
properties.description: Posted by Ayogista psychic moment with fellow KCRW volunteer cindy and spiritual advisor carole.

properties.name: day 8: boba tea with tina
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist 2111 Sawtelle Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90064a quick boba break with my sister tina before my weekend trip to philadelphia.

properties.name: day 9: movie with amanda and christina
properties.description: Posted by Ayogist 230 S 40th St, Philadelphia, PA 19104a wild time watching "borat" with my daughters amanda and christina.
